listitem.para:
This command outputs the characteristics of the machine in a list with the following format:
[IsWindows Wordsize BitmapWidth BitmapHeight IsPaletteEnable WindowsVersionLoWord WindowsVersionHiWord WorkingAreaWidth WorkingAreaHeight DesktopWidth DesktopHeight WindowWidth WindowHeight]
Where the meaning of each member is given by the table below.
Member Meaning
IsWindows 1, if this is Microsoft Windows. 0, otherwise.
Wordsize The number of bits in a machine word.
BitmapWidth The width of the drawable area on the MSWLogo Screen, in pixels.
BitmapHeight The height of the drawable area on the MSWLogo Screen, in pixels.
IsPaletteEnabled 1, if a palette is enabled, 0, otherwise.
WindowsVersionLoWord The minor version of Windows.
WindowsVersionHiWord The major version of Windows.
WorkingAreaWidth The width of the part of the desktop that is not obscured by the taskbar, in pixels.
WorkingAreaHeight The height of the part of the desktop that is not obscured by the taskbar, in pixels.
DesktopWidth The width of the whole desktop, in pixels.
DesktopHeight The height of the whole desktop, in pixels.
WindowWidth The width of the MSWLogo screen window, in pixels.
WindowHeight The height of the MSWLogo screen window, in pixels.
